page1.title: About Me
page1.content: DAVID LOPERA BETANCUR . Software Developer - .NET / Learning AI . I am a software engineer, and active student currently living in Cali, Colombia. . My interests range from technology to entrepreneurship. I am also interested in travel, programming, and soccer. . You can also read my blog in spanish if you are interested https://medium.com/@dloperab. . This website is powered by fastpages .
